snippet.title: Dead Man's Draw Official Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Get it today!
www.stardock.com/DeadMansDraw

The ULTIMATE game of risk & reward, where a single card can pile up gold or lose everything!

Draw cards, win gold, and unlock exciting new adventures in this addictively fun game of chance and skill. Join Scurvy Pete, Black Bonnie, and the dashing Sir Lovesword in a quest for pirate booty.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Easy to pick up, impossible to put down
- Chain together card combos to pile up your gold
- Win gold and unlock new treasures
- Use precious jewels to gain the upper hand against your dastardly foes
- High scores unlock special rewards
- Over 50 daring challenges with more to come
